plot outline: In the backdrop of a remote Indian village, snake-charming is no more a viable profession. Entertainment in different shape is now attracting villagers, so there is a direct confrontation between decaying culture, pure entertainment with colourful, cheap extravaganza. In this troubled time, the snake-charmer is found himself lost and his wife too. The snake-charmer's wife,the protagonist of the film refuses to abandon the world of the living. Her journey begins where past,present and future merge in the form of love and lust
